help.value:
To use: <div class="highlight php"> ... </div>

Where 'php' could be any language supported by GeSHi.

Note, you'll also need to grab GeSHi from here and unpack the archive to: [habari directory]/3rdparty/geshi

It's recommended that you use CDATA blocks (which the plugin will automatically strip), just in case the plugin is ever disabled:

<div class="highlight php"> <![CDATA[ <?php $foo = 'bar'; ?> ]]> </div>
